pkgmetadata.longdescription: A simple wrapper script that allows you to easily run Winetricks commands for Steam Play/Proton games. This is often useful when a game requires closed-source runtime libraries that are not included with Proton, or to activate Gallium Nine (native Direct3D 9 support) for a Proton game, without all the tedious messing around with Wine prefixes.

use.flag: Enable the graphical user interface (requires gnome-extra/zenity)
